name: SCP: Escape Together
description:
Based off of the 2012 horror game SCP: Containment Breach. Partner up or compete against your friends to explore the vast facility as well as gather useful, unknown, and potentially dangerous items to assist your escape and evade the potentially dangerous anomalies that roam the locked down facility.

With multiple stories (in development) and a map editor allowing community to create an endless amount of experiences for you to explore with your friends. With an in game proximity chat to help increase your immersion as well as a server-wide text chat for those who prefer to or is unable to use a microphone.
